summary: Professional coaching business website with services showcase and client connection features
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Professional coaching hero background image showing supportive, uplifting atmosphere (hero-coaching.dim_1920x1080.png)
- Warm, abstract icon representing personal growth and development (growth-icon.dim_256x256.png)
- Trust-building illustration for testimonials section (testimonial-bg.dim_800x600.png)

existing_features.title: Create a hero section with welcoming headline, brief introduction about the coaching services, and a call-to-action button
Build a services section displaying at least 3-4 coaching service offerings with descriptions
Create an about section explaining the coaching approach, methodology, and philosophy
Implement a contact form with fields for name, email, and message to enable client inquiries
Design a testimonials or social proof section to build credibility
Apply a warm, professional visual theme with cohesive color palette, modern typography, and inviting layout that conveys trust and approachability for a coaching business

new_feature_requests.summary: Create coaching business website with services showcase
Display coaching approach and methodology information
Enable client connection and contact features
